Title: Exempts site safety manager services, site safety coordinator services and concrete safety manager services from the sales and compensating use tax
Summary: Exempts site safety manager services, site safety coordinator services and concrete safety manager services from the sales and compensating use tax.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to exempting site safety manager services, site safety coordinator services and concrete safety manager services from the sales and compensating use tax
